title: Michigan, Texas A&M and Ole Miss Start Camp
description:
Wendi Nix, Rod Gilmore and Greg McElroy discuss how Michigan can defend its Big Ten title and if Cade McNamara or JJ McCarthy should be the starting quarterback in 2022. Plus, is this the year Jimbo Fisher leads Texas A&M to a breakout season in the SEC? Also, how does Ole Miss build on a 10-win season in 2021 after losing plenty of production? The crew also reacts to Nick Saban saying that 2021 was a rebuilding year for Alabama.
